job.title: Software Integration Engineer
job.description: ltpgtwe are looking for a software integration engineer in the houston tx area this is a full time position onsite that includes great benefits including health dental vision k pto and an annual bonusltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtthis position will be working with the backend of several applications including the servicenow platform as a software integration engineer your main responsibilities consists of communicating with various departments and understanding what needs to be done in developing solutions for various enterprise software systemsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgttechnical requirementsltpgtltulgtltligtsoftware development background in netltligtltligtcontainerization experience with docker and kubernetesltligtltligtexperience developing applications in high availability clusters getting to ensure that they are cloud readyltligtltligtexperience integrating various applications with the servicenow platformltligtltligtautomation experience with ansible and terraformltligtltligtexperience communicating with users to gather their requirementsltligtltulgt
